Description.Text: In the South of the island of Tenerife, on the Costa del Silencio, is the Palia hotel Parque Don Jose. In 2km, you will find a pebble beach and in about twenty minutes on foot, the small village Las Galletas, remained really typical with its shops, bars and restaurants. Parque Don Jose, thanks to the climate of the island which enjoys eternal spring weather, is a hotel club very pleasant for activity holidays in family or between friends. Its 187 apartments or studios are distributed in young 3-storeyed buildings (without elevator) of canary style, comfortable, and furnished soberly. All possess a complete bathroom, a ventilator in the ceiling, satellite TV, phones, safety box with extra charge, balcony or terrace. The restaurant will propose you local specialities and international kitchen in a buffet way, the wine and water are included in the meals. Reception 24 hours a day, snack bar, bar opening on a terrace where we shall suggest you the marvellous cocktails, TV Beautiful swimming pool of very big sea water (just like a lagoon) with a small swimming pool incorporated for children with sun-beds and parasols, 1 smaller swimming pool warmed in winter, tennis, volleyball, French-ball, archery, shot in the rifle, the darts, the ping-pong, the aerobics, aqua-gym, and an area of games for the children.room, foreign exchange office, laundry service with extra charge, car rental.
